title: Development of Expert Mathematics Instructional Design Utilizing Generative Artificial Intelligence (GenAI)

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Course for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to learn how to utilize GenAI in developing mathematics education content. Project-based assessments conducted in environments with provided digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can automate at least three activities in the mathematics instructional design process using GenAI tools.
Learners can design a verification process that ensures the accuracy of generated mathematical content at 80% or higher.
Learners can propose GenAI-integrated educational strategies tailored to their institutional environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
